page.title: 10HOUSING
page.content: In Flushing most of the buildings are old and are built in terraces.The Packet Captains houses line the harbour and are fine examples of three or four storey Georgian houses. The remaining dwellings are cottages of moderate size.They mostly have three bedrooms a living room,bathroom and a kitchen.The kitchen would have had a Cornish range,the other rooms would have an open fire.The members of the family would bath in front of the fire in the living room.Most cottages have now been modernized,with electric cookers in the kitchen and bathroom and toilet.
